attributes.action: Hauliers struggling due to fuel prices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The price that you are charging for fuel at the moment is causing a lot of problems through out the haulage industry. A lot of haulage companies based in britain are going to end up bankrupt or in liquidation due to these prices because foreign hauliers can quote cheaper rates due to them not paying road tax and the fact that they can fill up cheaper abroad.

rejection.details: Your title should be a call for action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
